description: Gets the status of the specified upload.

parameters.name: uploadId
parameters.description: The ID of the upload. This value is returned by the UploadEntityDefinitions action.

nested_items.name: uploadStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the upload. The initial status is IN_PROGRESS. The response show all validation failures if the upload fails.

nested_items.name: namespaceName
nested_items.description: The name of the upload's namespace.

nested_items.name: namespaceVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the user's namespace. Defaults to the latest version of the user's namespace.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: The reason for an upload failure.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date at which the upload was created.
